information: With the fragrant plasticity of glutinous rice mixed with the greasy taste of Gac fruit and natural bright red color, Gac sticky rice is loved by most families.

relatedRecipes.name: Authentic Pho
relatedRecipes.description: Pho is a soup consisting of bone broth, rice noodles, thinly-sliced meat (in this recipe, it's beef), and fresh garnishes.

relatedRecipes.name: Vietnamese Pickled Onion
relatedRecipes.description: Pickled Onion is a delicious Tet dish that is very popular because of its sweet and sour taste, delicious and crispy, which helps to prevent boredom with greasy, nutrient-rich, and indigestion-causing dishes such as banh chung, meat, fish, etc. This wild, idyllic place also appears on the daily rice tray because of its irresistible appeal.

author: Susan Jones
seoDesc: Gac Sticky Rice is loved by most families in Vietnam, with the fragrant plasticity of glutinous rice mixed with the greasy taste
description: With the fragrant plasticity of glutinous rice mixed with the greasy taste of Gac fruit and natural bright red color, Gac sticky rice is loved by most families.

directions.desc: Soak glutinous rice overnight for 6-8 hours, add a little salt to the water to soak the rice.
Cut the Gac fruit in half, then scoop out all the seeds and guts of the Gac fruit into a bowl. Add 1 teaspoon of wine and a pinch of salt and mix well.
For the above mixture, mix well with the soaked rice, mix and squeeze so that the Gac seeds and Gac meat blend with the rice so that the color is the most uniform.

Pour water into the rice cooker until it boils, put the sticky rice mixed with the Gac in step 3 into the steaming rack of the rice cooker. Remember to poke a few holes to let the steam rise evenly, and remember to dig often during the cooking process so that the sticky rice is cooked evenly and at its best.

When the rice cooker bounces for the second time, add the sugar and coconut milk and stir well. The amount of sugar will depend on whether you eat more or less sweet. Then cover the pot and leave it for another 10 to 12 minutes to enjoy the sticky rice Gac with coconut milk.

Put the sticky rice on a plate, you can create a beautiful carp, flower, ... with sticky rice mold, then put the grated coconut on top to decorate as well as enjoy with sticky rice Gac with coconut water.

seoTitle: How To Make Authentic Gac Sticky Rice
name: Gac Sticky Rice
